entry.title: "mmath.h"
entry.summary:
"mmath.h"

/*
[More Math Algorithms To Highers]
Code by izumi@Uchiha Dev Team
Uchiha Dev Team (c) 2020
E-mail: 2335979273@qq.com
*/
#ifndef MMATH
#define MMATH

#include <math.h>
#include <stdarg.h>
#include <string>

using std::string;
using std::ostream;
int min (int a, int b) //æœ€å°å€¼ 
{
	return a < b ? a : b;
}
int max (int a, int b) //æœ€å¤§å€¼ 
{
	return a > b ? a : b;
}
void cswap (int a, int b)
{
	int t = a; a = b; b = t;
}
int gcd (int n, int k) //æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•° 
{
	return k == 0 ? n : gcd (k, (n % k));
}
int lcm (int n, int k) //æœ€å°å…¬å€æ•° 
{
	return n * k / gcd (n, k);
}
int power (int base, int pow) //å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚ 
{
    int result = 1;
    while (pow > 0) 
	{
        if (pow & 1) result = result * base;
        pow >>= 1;
        base = base * base;
    }
    return result;
}
//åˆ†æ•°ç»“æ„ä½“ 
struct frac
{
	int numerator; //åˆ†å­ 
	int denominator; //åˆ†æ¯
	int reduc_frac () //çº¦åˆ† 
	{
		int temp = gcd (numerator, denominator);
		numerator /= temp;
		denominator /= temp;
	}
	int operator = (string c) //åˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ†æ•° ï¼ˆä¾‹ï¼šfrac a = "1/2";ï¼‰ 
	{
		if (c.size () <= 0) return -1;
		int i, j, x = 0, y = 0;
		for (i = 0; c[i] != '/'; ++i) x = x * 10 + (c[i] - '0');
		for (j = i + 1; j < c.size (); ++j) y = y * 10 + (c[j] - '0');
		numerator = x;
		denominator = y;
		return 1;
	}
	frac ()
	{
		numerator = 0;
		denominator = 1;
		reduc_frac ();
	}
};
int reduc_com (frac a, frac b) //é€šåˆ† 
{
	int temp = lcm (a.denominator, b.denominator);
	a.numerator *= (temp / a.denominator);
	b.numerator *= (temp / a.denominator);
	a.denominator = b.denominator = temp;
	return 1;
}
frac operator + (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°åŠ æ³• 
{
	frac ans;
	reduc_com (a, b);
	ans.denominator = a.denominator;
	ans.numerator = a.numerator + b.numerator;
	ans.reduc_frac ();
	return ans;
}
frac operator - (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°å‡æ³• 
{
	frac ans;
	reduc_com (a, b);
	ans.denominator = a.denominator;
	ans.numerator = a.numerator - b.numerator;
	ans.reduc_frac ();
	return ans;
}
frac operator * (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°ä¹˜æ³• 
{
	frac ans;
	ans.denominator = a.denominator * b.denominator;
	ans.numerator = a.numerator * b.numerator;
	ans.reduc_frac ();
	return ans;
}
frac operator / (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°é™¤æ³• 
{
	cswap (b.denominator, b.numerator);
	return a * b;
}
frac operator ^ (frac n, int k)
{
	frac ans;
	ans.numerator = power (n.numerator, k);
	ans.denominator = power (n.denominator, k);
	return ans;
}

#define SMA
/*
[String Maths Algorithms]
Code by itachi@Uchiha Dev Team
Uchiha Dev Team (c) 2020
E-mail: 2335979273@qq.com
*/
string plus (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åŠ æ³• 
{
    string ans;
    int len1 = a.length (); int len2 = b.length ();
    if (len1 < len2) for (int i = 1; i <= len2 - len1; ++i) a = "0" + a;
    else for (int i = 1; i <= len1 - len2; ++i) b = "0" + b;
    len1 = a.length ();
    int cf = 0, temp;
    for (int i = len1 - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        temp = a[i] - '0' + b[i] - '0' + cf;
        cf = temp / 10; temp %= 10;
        ans = char (temp + '0') + ans;
    }
    if (cf != 0) ans = char (cf + '0') + ans;
    return ans;
}
string minus (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‡æ³• 
{
    string str;
    int pr = 0;
    if (a < b) 
    {
        swap (a, b); pr = -1;
    }
    int tmp = a.length () - b.length(), cf = 0;
    for (int i = b.length () - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        if (b[tmp + i] < b[i] + cf)
        {
            str = char (a[tmp + i] - b[i] - cf + '0' + 10) + str;
            cf = 1;
        }
        else
        {
            str = char (a[tmp + i] - b[i] - cf + '0') + str;
            cf = 0;
        }
    }
    for (int i = tmp - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        if (a[i] - cf >= '0')
        {
            str = char (a[i] - cf) + str;
            cf = 0;
        }
        else
        {
            str = char (a[i] - cf + 10) + str;
            cf = 1;
        }
    }
    str.erase (0, str.find_first_not_of ('0'));
    if (str.size () == 0) 
    {
        str = "0";
        pr = -1;
    }
    if (pr == 0) str = "-" + str;
    return str;
}
string times (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¹˜æ³• 
{
    int len1 = a.length (), len2 = b.length ();
    string str, tempstr;
    for (int i = len2 - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        tempstr = "";
        int temp = b[i] - '0', t = 0, cf = 0;
        if (temp != 0)
        {
            for (int j = 1; j <= len2 - 1 - i; ++j) tempstr += "0";
            for (int j = len1 - 1; j >= 0; --j)
            {
                t = (temp * (a[j] - '0') + cf) % 10;
                cf = (temp * (a[j] - '0') + cf) / 10;
                tempstr = char (t + '0') + tempstr;
            }
            if (cf != 0) tempstr = char (cf + '0') + tempstr;
        }
        str = plus (str, tempstr);
    }
    str.erase (0, str.find_first_not_of ('0'));
    return str;
}
string div (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ•´é™¤ 
{
    string ans;
    while (a > b)
    {
        int n = 0;
        string A = a.substr (0, b.length ());
        while (1) 
        {
            string t = minus (A, b);
            if (t >= "0")
            {
                n++;
                A = t;
            }
            else break;
        }
        ans = char (n + '0') + ans;
        if (A == "0") a = a.substr (b.length ());
        else a = A + a.substr (b.length ());
    }
    return ans;
}
int operator /= (string a, string b)
{
	string ans = div (a, b);
	a = ans;
	return 1;
}
string mod (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å–ä½™ 
{
    string ans;
    while (a > b)
    {
        int n = 0;
        string A = a.substr (0, b.length ());
        while (1) 
        {
            string t = minus (A, b);
            if (t >= "0")
            {
                n++;
                A = t;
            }
            else break;
        }
        ans = char (n + '0') + ans;
        if (A == "0") a = a.substr (b.length ());
        else a = A + a.substr (b.length ());
    }
    return a;
}
string spow (string n, string k) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¹˜æ–¹ 
{
    if (k == "0") return "1";
    else if (mod (k, "2") == "1") return times (n, spow (n, minus (k, "1")));
    else return times (spow (n, div (k, "2")), spow (n, div (k, "2")));
}
string sabs (string x) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç»å¯¹å€¼ 
{
    if (x[0] == '-') x[0] = 0;
    return x;
}
int null (string x) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º 
{
    int i = 0;
    while (i++) if (x[i] != '0') return 1;
    return 0;
}
string sgcd (string n, string k) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•° 
{
    string t;
    while (!null (k))   
    {
        t = n; n = k; k = mod (t, k);  
    }
    return n;
}  
string slcm (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æœ€å°å…¬å€æ•° 
{
    return div (times (a, b), sgcd (a, b));
} 
//å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ†æ•°ç»“æ„ä½“ 
struct str_frac
{
	string numerator; //åˆ†å­ 
	string denominator; //åˆ†æ¯
	int reduc_frac () //çº¦åˆ† 
	{
		string temp = sgcd (numerator, denominator);
		numerator /= temp;
		denominator /= temp;
	}
	int operator = (string c) //åˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ†æ•° ï¼ˆä¾‹ï¼šfrac a = "1/2";ï¼‰ 
	{
		if (c.size () <= 0) return -1;
		int i, j;
		string x = "0", y = "0";
		for (i = 0; c[i] != '/'; ++i) x[i] = c[i];
		for (j = i + 1; j < c.size (); ++j) y[j] = c[j];
		numerator = x;
		denominator = y;
		return 1;
	} 
	str_frac ()
	{
		numerator = "0";
		denominator = "1";
	}
};

#endif
entry.content:
"mmath.h"

/*
[More Math Algorithms To Highers]
Code by izumi@Uchiha Dev Team
Uchiha Dev Team (c) 2020
E-mail: 2335979273@qq.com
*/
#ifndef MMATH
#define MMATH

#include <math.h>
#include <stdarg.h>
#include <string>

using std::string;
using std::ostream;
int min (int a, int b) //æœ€å°å€¼ 
{
	return a < b ? a : b;
}
int max (int a, int b) //æœ€å¤§å€¼ 
{
	return a > b ? a : b;
}
void cswap (int a, int b)
{
	int t = a; a = b; b = t;
}
int gcd (int n, int k) //æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•° 
{
	return k == 0 ? n : gcd (k, (n % k));
}
int lcm (int n, int k) //æœ€å°å…¬å€æ•° 
{
	return n * k / gcd (n, k);
}
int power (int base, int pow) //å¿«é€Ÿå¹‚ 
{
    int result = 1;
    while (pow > 0) 
	{
        if (pow & 1) result = result * base;
        pow >>= 1;
        base = base * base;
    }
    return result;
}
//åˆ†æ•°ç»“æ„ä½“ 
struct frac
{
	int numerator; //åˆ†å­ 
	int denominator; //åˆ†æ¯
	int reduc_frac () //çº¦åˆ† 
	{
		int temp = gcd (numerator, denominator);
		numerator /= temp;
		denominator /= temp;
	}
	int operator = (string c) //åˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ†æ•° ï¼ˆä¾‹ï¼šfrac a = "1/2";ï¼‰ 
	{
		if (c.size () <= 0) return -1;
		int i, j, x = 0, y = 0;
		for (i = 0; c[i] != '/'; ++i) x = x * 10 + (c[i] - '0');
		for (j = i + 1; j < c.size (); ++j) y = y * 10 + (c[j] - '0');
		numerator = x;
		denominator = y;
		return 1;
	}
	frac ()
	{
		numerator = 0;
		denominator = 1;
		reduc_frac ();
	}
};
int reduc_com (frac a, frac b) //é€šåˆ† 
{
	int temp = lcm (a.denominator, b.denominator);
	a.numerator *= (temp / a.denominator);
	b.numerator *= (temp / a.denominator);
	a.denominator = b.denominator = temp;
	return 1;
}
frac operator + (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°åŠ æ³• 
{
	frac ans;
	reduc_com (a, b);
	ans.denominator = a.denominator;
	ans.numerator = a.numerator + b.numerator;
	ans.reduc_frac ();
	return ans;
}
frac operator - (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°å‡æ³• 
{
	frac ans;
	reduc_com (a, b);
	ans.denominator = a.denominator;
	ans.numerator = a.numerator - b.numerator;
	ans.reduc_frac ();
	return ans;
}
frac operator * (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°ä¹˜æ³• 
{
	frac ans;
	ans.denominator = a.denominator * b.denominator;
	ans.numerator = a.numerator * b.numerator;
	ans.reduc_frac ();
	return ans;
}
frac operator / (frac a, frac b) //åˆ†æ•°é™¤æ³• 
{
	cswap (b.denominator, b.numerator);
	return a * b;
}
frac operator ^ (frac n, int k)
{
	frac ans;
	ans.numerator = power (n.numerator, k);
	ans.denominator = power (n.denominator, k);
	return ans;
}

#define SMA
/*
[String Maths Algorithms]
Code by itachi@Uchiha Dev Team
Uchiha Dev Team (c) 2020
E-mail: 2335979273@qq.com
*/
string plus (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åŠ æ³• 
{
    string ans;
    int len1 = a.length (); int len2 = b.length ();
    if (len1 < len2) for (int i = 1; i <= len2 - len1; ++i) a = "0" + a;
    else for (int i = 1; i <= len1 - len2; ++i) b = "0" + b;
    len1 = a.length ();
    int cf = 0, temp;
    for (int i = len1 - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        temp = a[i] - '0' + b[i] - '0' + cf;
        cf = temp / 10; temp %= 10;
        ans = char (temp + '0') + ans;
    }
    if (cf != 0) ans = char (cf + '0') + ans;
    return ans;
}
string minus (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‡æ³• 
{
    string str;
    int pr = 0;
    if (a < b) 
    {
        swap (a, b); pr = -1;
    }
    int tmp = a.length () - b.length(), cf = 0;
    for (int i = b.length () - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        if (b[tmp + i] < b[i] + cf)
        {
            str = char (a[tmp + i] - b[i] - cf + '0' + 10) + str;
            cf = 1;
        }
        else
        {
            str = char (a[tmp + i] - b[i] - cf + '0') + str;
            cf = 0;
        }
    }
    for (int i = tmp - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        if (a[i] - cf >= '0')
        {
            str = char (a[i] - cf) + str;
            cf = 0;
        }
        else
        {
            str = char (a[i] - cf + 10) + str;
            cf = 1;
        }
    }
    str.erase (0, str.find_first_not_of ('0'));
    if (str.size () == 0) 
    {
        str = "0";
        pr = -1;
    }
    if (pr == 0) str = "-" + str;
    return str;
}
string times (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¹˜æ³• 
{
    int len1 = a.length (), len2 = b.length ();
    string str, tempstr;
    for (int i = len2 - 1; i >= 0; --i)
    {
        tempstr = "";
        int temp = b[i] - '0', t = 0, cf = 0;
        if (temp != 0)
        {
            for (int j = 1; j <= len2 - 1 - i; ++j) tempstr += "0";
            for (int j = len1 - 1; j >= 0; --j)
            {
                t = (temp * (a[j] - '0') + cf) % 10;
                cf = (temp * (a[j] - '0') + cf) / 10;
                tempstr = char (t + '0') + tempstr;
            }
            if (cf != 0) tempstr = char (cf + '0') + tempstr;
        }
        str = plus (str, tempstr);
    }
    str.erase (0, str.find_first_not_of ('0'));
    return str;
}
string div (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ•´é™¤ 
{
    string ans;
    while (a > b)
    {
        int n = 0;
        string A = a.substr (0, b.length ());
        while (1) 
        {
            string t = minus (A, b);
            if (t >= "0")
            {
                n++;
                A = t;
            }
            else break;
        }
        ans = char (n + '0') + ans;
        if (A == "0") a = a.substr (b.length ());
        else a = A + a.substr (b.length ());
    }
    return ans;
}
int operator /= (string a, string b)
{
	string ans = div (a, b);
	a = ans;
	return 1;
}
string mod (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å–ä½™ 
{
    string ans;
    while (a > b)
    {
        int n = 0;
        string A = a.substr (0, b.length ());
        while (1) 
        {
            string t = minus (A, b);
            if (t >= "0")
            {
                n++;
                A = t;
            }
            else break;
        }
        ans = char (n + '0') + ans;
        if (A == "0") a = a.substr (b.length ());
        else a = A + a.substr (b.length ());
    }
    return a;
}
string spow (string n, string k) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¹˜æ–¹ 
{
    if (k == "0") return "1";
    else if (mod (k, "2") == "1") return times (n, spow (n, minus (k, "1")));
    else return times (spow (n, div (k, "2")), spow (n, div (k, "2")));
}
string sabs (string x) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ç»å¯¹å€¼ 
{
    if (x[0] == '-') x[0] = 0;
    return x;
}
int null (string x) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º 
{
    int i = 0;
    while (i++) if (x[i] != '0') return 1;
    return 0;
}
string sgcd (string n, string k) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æœ€å¤§å…¬çº¦æ•° 
{
    string t;
    while (!null (k))   
    {
        t = n; n = k; k = mod (t, k);  
    }
    return n;
}  
string slcm (string a, string b) //å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æœ€å°å…¬å€æ•° 
{
    return div (times (a, b), sgcd (a, b));
} 
//å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ†æ•°ç»“æ„ä½“ 
struct str_frac
{
	string numerator; //åˆ†å­ 
	string denominator; //åˆ†æ¯
	int reduc_frac () //çº¦åˆ† 
	{
		string temp = sgcd (numerator, denominator);
		numerator /= temp;
		denominator /= temp;
	}
	int operator = (string c) //åˆå§‹åŒ–åˆ†æ•° ï¼ˆä¾‹ï¼šfrac a = "1/2";ï¼‰ 
	{
		if (c.size () <= 0) return -1;
		int i, j;
		string x = "0", y = "0";
		for (i = 0; c[i] != '/'; ++i) x[i] = c[i];
		for (j = i + 1; j < c.size (); ++j) y[j] = c[j];
		numerator = x;
		denominator = y;
		return 1;
	} 
	str_frac ()
	{
		numerator = "0";
		denominator = "1";
	}
};

#endif

entry.title: Hello Gridea
entry.content:
ğŸ‘ æ¬¢è¿ä½¿ç”¨ Gridea ï¼
âœï¸ Gridea ä¸€ä¸ªé™æ€åšå®¢å†™ä½œå®¢æˆ·ç«¯ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥ç”¨å®ƒæ¥è®°å½•ä½ çš„ç”Ÿæ´»ã€å¿ƒæƒ…ã€çŸ¥è¯†ã€ç¬”è®°ã€åˆ›æ„... ...

Github
Gridea ä¸»é¡µ
ç¤ºä¾‹ç½‘ç«™

ç‰¹æ€§ğŸ‘‡

ğŸ“ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨æœ€é…·çš„ Markdown è¯­æ³•ï¼Œè¿›è¡Œå¿«é€Ÿåˆ›ä½œ

ğŸŒ‰ ä½ å¯ä»¥ç»™æ–‡ç« é…ä¸Šç²¾ç¾çš„å°é¢å›¾å’Œåœ¨æ–‡ç« ä»»æ„ä½ç½®æ’å…¥å›¾ç‰‡

ğŸ·ï¸ ä½ å¯ä»¥å¯¹æ–‡ç« è¿›è¡Œæ ‡ç­¾åˆ†ç»„

ğŸ“‹ ä½ å¯ä»¥è‡ªå®šä¹‰èœå•ï¼Œç”šè‡³å¯ä»¥åˆ›å»ºå¤–éƒ¨é“¾æ¥èœå•

ğŸ’» ä½ å¯ä»¥åœ¨ Windowsï¼ŒMacOS æˆ– Linux è®¾å¤‡ä¸Šä½¿ç”¨æ­¤å®¢æˆ·ç«¯

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ ğ–¦ğ—‚ğ—ğ—ğ—ğ–» ğ–¯ğ–ºğ—€ğ–¾ğ—Œ æˆ– Coding Pages å‘ä¸–ç•Œå±•ç¤ºï¼Œæœªæ¥å°†æ”¯æŒæ›´å¤šå¹³å°

ğŸ’¬ ä½ å¯ä»¥è¿›è¡Œç®€å•çš„é…ç½®ï¼Œæ¥å…¥ Gitalk æˆ– DisqusJS è¯„è®ºç³»ç»Ÿ

ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­æ–‡ç®€ä½“æˆ–è‹±è¯­

ğŸŒ ä½ å¯ä»¥ä»»æ„ä½¿ç”¨åº”ç”¨å†…é»˜è®¤ä¸»é¢˜æˆ–ä»»æ„ç¬¬ä¸‰æ–¹ä¸»é¢˜ï¼Œå¼ºå¤§çš„ä¸»é¢˜è‡ªå®šä¹‰èƒ½åŠ›
